review_text: My favorite grocery store carries Zum products and the display is near the entrance I use. I've been curious about it, but never "bit". This sample set was perfect as an introduction. I kept a couple items for myself and used the rest as stocking stuffers. My adult kids love all-naturals products. I really like the ones I tried, enough so that I'll be purchasing some of the full-size products!

review_title: Mini package to try every product
review_text: The delivery is very soon. This package included hand soap, mist, goat milk soaps, laundry soap, and body lotions. But everyone is so small. I don't like the smell of that mist (amber) because it's too thick for me. But the smell lingered for a long time, which exceeded my realization.

review_title: I like the Lavender hand wash scent
review_text: They are as described.  the amber room spray makes me think of vanilla fields.  the laundry soap smells nice and I think better than the body soap for some reason.  (maybe it's just me ??) The samples of lotion are plentiful for one body use, though I am fairly small.  Overall, I'd say it's worth the $15 paid for it

This is an awesome little kit to get you started because you get to experience a lot of the wonderful scents that they have to offer , and you will definitely be hooked and find your favorite after ordering this kit. And if you‚Äôre not using any of the soaps or the laundry detergent. Then definitely order this now and all of them will be your favorites. I currently use all of these different items and more.

I bought this for my sister's birthday, and she loved it! She said she liked the variety and the scents were great. I've used/purchased most of the Zum products for myself for years so I knew what good quality she was getting before I purchased this. Would highly recommend!

This is the second time I‚Äôve ordered this sample package of Zum. The products are the right size to travel with. The travel size package offers a variety of the different products that zum has. I Iabsolutely love the laundry soap. It has a wonderful smell. The room spray and hand wash are also lovely with such wonderful smells. I highly recommend.

I love everything about Zum products. I have purchased a gift package to give samples to friends. They are great to use as they don't affect my sensitive health issues, especially their scents.  The quality of all products are  amazing and the clothes washing detergent is very gentle and many people comment on the scent I leave wafting behind me.

I bought this as a birthday gift for a family member. The scents are quite pleasant. The size of each bar of soap and other items was rather small, but that is OK. The packaging was a cute transparent zipper bag. I chose this gift set because it had a good variety of products and seems to be good quality. She really liked her gift!

The best product I've found online in a long time . The soaps smell amazing. The room body spray is my absolute favorite it literally eliminates pet odor too !. The soaps are very clean smelling and fresh feeling. The gift set is packed with little extras. Two bars of soap a room sprays and hand soap laundry packets . I couldn't be more happy . I'm looking for the products in bigger sizes so I never run out . A must have esp with having kids and pets

Excited to gift this for Christmas to a dear friend. The scent is usually nice and the quality of the products usually are pleasing. I like that the package has a lot of goodies in it. The sizes are small they are trial sizes of the products to use. Feels nice.

I love the quality,size and incredible scents of each of the items in the Zum bag. I love the laundry soap. I will definitely buy more and use it with every load. This package is a convenient way to test the benefits of the soaps, creams and lip balm.

I first tried out the laundry soap and loved the scent and the cleaning effect, so would like to out other product of the same brand. The size of 
individual is small, but is good enough to try them out. Its small size is good for travel, yet good enough for use for a short trip for up to, say 5 days. Am happy to order the full size of some of the items in this kit.

review_title: This introduced me to Zum products -Thanks!
review_text: I really appreciate that this was available. I wanted to try Zum products and this provided me an opportunity to try a variety of products and scents without a huge investment in case I didn't like something. I wish more companies would provide this. As Zum can attest to, I made purchases for the regular sized versions of some of these products.

The smells of the products very a lot. I lived the amber,  but the one for laundry is too strong for me, and it stays on clothes for a long time. Hard soaps are also too strong for my nose, and tge liquid soap is wonderful, and very pleasant to my hands.

I love Zum products, especially the scented frankincense and myrrh soap and laundy detergent.  They are gentle and good for sensitive skin.  The room and body spray smells like vainilla, and the scent lingers for a long time. This travel kit is a good way to try them; just be aware that the sizes are very small.

review_title: Good set to try out Zum's products
review_text: I love the soaps and how fragrant they are. If you order the kit in the summer it'll imprint the smell on everything you get because it's not very well packaged, so be careful not to order food stuff with it. I still think it's kind of expensive for the amount of product you get, they're all minis. Even the bar soap. I was surprised I like the room and body spray. I think I'll check out if they have other scents.

review_title: It's OK. I liked the scent
review_text:
First of all,  the samples are TINY, so not great VFM. The lotion sample is barely usable for its tininess... 
We did like some products more than others. The laundry soap sample is large enough to test 2-3 loads, which is great and that was the main reason for me to get this bag.  I liked the scent, but it becomes very moldy if you forget the load for a couple of hours as I did, so watch it.  As for performance, it was fair. I've seen much worse performing eco-friendly laundry fluids. The soap bars, as tiny as they were, were a huge success. Very nice smell and feel.  I wouldn't buy the full size, though. way too expensive. 
The hand wash is just OK, and so is the lip balm stick. 

Summing this up, a very nice treat, but not for daily use, for poor VFM.

I gave this a 4 because it was good in that you get 8 pieces to try and know if you would buy them.  I have allergies and most of them I would never be able to use due to the strong smells but some people might think they were wonderful??

review_title: Smells Great But On the Smaller Side
review_text: It‚Äôs always fun to get a sample kit! I like that there are diverse kinds of products in this set but I do wish the samples were bigger. You can immediately smell the nice scents through the bag which is a good sign. I look forward to trying them all out.
I love Zum products and bought these for gifts. They are great for travel and I love that Zum uses real natural oils for fragrance and not fake scents.

Great idea to give things a try! Also good as a travel pack. Love all the products!! (The packaging is really cute too). Everything is gentle & great for my sensitive skin, & smell AMAZING!! (doesn‚Äôt dry you out)

This was a good way to try out many of the Zum products.  I first tried the lundry detergent and loved it so wanted to experience some of the other products.  The bath soap and lotions are especially nice and leave your skin feeling clean.  The scents are wonderful.
This a a great variety of items. I bought it as part of a Mother‚Äôs Day gift but it gave me a chance to smell everything to see what else I may like. It‚Äôs like the best sampler ever.
This will be the best little gift for my friend's birthday. All the pieces are small, sample sized and will be fun for her to have. It smells lovely, by the way!
So many amazing products in one little bag. All are ready to stash in a travel bag. The scent of the frankincense & myrrh goat-milk soap is heavenly.
This smells ammmmmmmazing! I got this as a gift for a friend. It‚Äôs not super big or small- the size is medium. It comes with delicious smelling things. I want to keep it for myself!
I just love all the little trial size products I have tried a few of them and the sense are fantastic perfect sizes for travel
I have used Zum Bar Soap & Mist in a few different scents. This is a cute little array of different products with new scents I have never tried before. Great price! Also, it makes a nice little gift.
I bought this to create a gift package with some other Zum products.  The products smell absolutely amazing!  The recipient was very happy with the trial sizes, too!

Perfect gift or just to treat yourself to some goodies. Mini soaps
and sample sizes included. I wanted to try out the scents before buying a larger size. Zum is one of my new go to brands!

Lots of terrific stuff in this small gift bag and everything smells so wonderful. There‚Äôs a little of everything, but a little goes a long way when you‚Äôre talking about scent. The only thing missing is bath salts.
This sample pack of Zum products is a great way to try what they have to offer.  From lip balm to laundry detergent these natural products work and smell amazing!  Love the limited ingredients!
nice and small package for my trial and travel, and this is good for before me before want to buy the full-size product.  I'm also using this nice and attractive package to decorate my room.
This brand is new for me, but I really like it. very nice soap, lip balm, spray and laundry soap. I will  order big sizes. It has such a nice smell like u are in a spa salon.

review_title: Great for travel or to see what you like.
review_text: I'm glad I ordered this set. I wanted to try some new soaps and didn't want to make a major investment. This was perfect to try several things. I would reorder for travel as well.

I love Zum products especially laundry soap. It smells natural and moves dirt efficiently. This set is very tiny. Body lotion and laundry soap are more like ‚Äòtry it‚Äô set. I think it would be a good set for traveling.

I recently purchased a set of soaps and body lotions, and while I'm generally pleased with the product, there are a couple of drawbacks worth noting.

The positive aspects include the delightful assortment of fragrances, which are both refreshing and long-lasting. The variety in the set is a nice touch, providing options for different moods and occasions.

However, my main concern is that both the soaps and body lotions leave a noticeable soapy scent and film on the skin. While the scent is pleasant initially, it tends to linger longer than I would prefer. Additionally, the film left behind makes me feel like I haven't completely rinsed off the product, which can be a bit uncomfortable.

On the upside, the packaging is appealing and convenient, and the soaps lather well. If you don't mind a lingering scent and film, this set could be a great fit. Personally, I'll continue to use it intermittently for the fragrances but may explore other options for a cleaner feel.

Nice assortment of things. The chapstick tube is for reference to gauge the sizes of these smaller products. While the soaps are smaller, they will last for some time. I really like their whole line so this was a good purchase for myself.

Hand soap and spray is really nice, washing detergent doesnt seem to last on clothes. Havent tried the soaps yet being so small, will probably save for the suitcase, and the bath salts are quite nice.

I like this variety sample selection, very nice scent and quality products, perfect for travel . the body soap feels good on my skin, the hand soap is easy to use in the small spray bottle. lip balm has a smooth feel and nice scent. I recommend for a gift, or personal use.

I am enjoying the body/mist spray a lot. it's a small size, but it's lasting a while.

Just having the soap made my room fragrant, the frankincense and myrrh soap mess is no nice. the travel size lavender soap is also great, as I've used it a few times now.

Haven't got to the laundry soap, or the lip balm yet, but if the other parts are this good, I'm sure I'll be happy.
Always prefer to purchase organic products and the price always affordable.
Love Zum products!  This is a fun assortment of products!
Loved every product & will definitely be back for more. Naturally friendly as well!
Love all the scent. Perfect use for travel or gifts. Best quality. Size fits and needs. Ziplock package.
Great little pack, with 2 perfect soap with a nice scent. Quality product

small size but have a verity of products 
Loves the smell 
Very gentle on a sensitive and dry skin 
Very nice package
Enjoyed trying each of the samples in this pack. honestly the parcel on arrival smelt so good! have purchased candles since.
Lovely brand. The sprays smell soooo good, soaps and lotion too and laundry detergent works well!
good and reasonable price. deliver the results. will buy again. should have more variety to choose.

review_title: Absolutely Perfect to Keep in a Laundry Room
review_text:
Everything about this set is perfect!
The tiny bars of soap are perfect for scrubbing collars.
The delightful scent of all of the products in this gift bag was divine, they use the perfect combination, I‚Äôll be purchasing again!
I love this to go kit! The scents are great. I love having different things to chose from. Great quality. Perfect size. Greta package.
Newer to this brand after trying their very good laundry detergent.   Really enjoying the soaps.   Great price to try out new products.
Gave it as a gift to a friend. She loved it!

review_title: Wonderful sample of a lot of product
review_text: Love the smells and the natural ingredients.  I took it apart and could gift the samples as treats in birthday packages.
If you haven‚Äôt tried some of the Zum products this is an affordable way to do so. I like this package for travel!
I like zum product this set size good for travel
Nice to have this kit size if you want to try out these products. Really high quality. Wonderful scent
I gave this to a friend as a small gift and she loved it!
I love Zum it doesn‚Äôt dry up my skin and the fragrance is subtle and fresh.
I live the fragrance, consistency and performance of each product
This is a really good item to try the products before you buy the fullsize. I like the ZUM products very much. Recommend this!
This was a delightful assortment of all my favorite Zum  goodies l wanted to try. Well worth the money.
Zum products are quality.  The multi product package is a fun way to try the many different products Zum produces and experience them.
I like Zum brand so much so would like to try this set with various items.  All items are excellent and highly recommended!
Love the smell of the products. Bought as stocking stuffers for friends and family. Nice size for travel
Love this set. Lots of things to try and nicely put together.  Especially love the smell. Highly recommend.
Good quality and size! Recommend trying it!  I will buy it again!
zum.bum favorites..love all this different products....smells great..would highly recommend
This set is a great way to try various Zum products. I kind of thought the products would be bigger, but they are certainly great and the smell is divine.
Love gift sets with different samples; l love the ZUM  brand and I‚Äôm excited to try the detergent. This is a great bathroom set with a variety of toiletry samples that all smell great!
I love this sampler! I get compliments all the time for  scents of frankincense that seems to follow me from the room spray and soaps.

review_title: Love this adorable set . Smells amazing
review_text: Everything smells great. Using the soaps and love them. The body and room spray smells great. The hand soap is amazing. Would love to get a bigger hand soap for sure ! Everything is high quality.

I've come to love Zum products so much that everytime there's a sampler I'd go for it. This one is nice cause it give an idea of different products from Zum and also very travel-size  friendly which works great in this vacation season.
I love the Zum patchouli laundry soap and got this cute sample set as a gift. It's full of lovely scents and a variety of products to try. All natural products for a healthy home!
This was a great way to try many different Zum products and the liquid soap and room/ body spray are awesome refillable sizes!  Highly recommend!
I love the smell of the Zum products, the scent of the soap makes my guest bathroom smell clean.  Can‚Äôt wait to try detergent.
Good small sizes products.. fruity  fresh, smell, I like this for travel
Though sample sizes are small, it is a good selection of Zum products.
the quantity is awful for the price. the product seems great but they are ripping people off with how much u get

I was excited when I discovered that the products I was interested in, such as the Amber Room & Body Spray and the Frankincense & Myrrh Laundry Soap, were included in a set! When I was looking at the reviews, I noticed some negative reviews, such as the smell being like an old man's scent and the smell being too strong, so I didn't buy it, but this one feels like it's only for one use, except for the bottle. Since the content is , I wonder what it's like for someone like me? I think this is recommended for those who think so. My impression is that these are scents that people who like Aesop will find acceptable. As a result, I liked it ^^ However, the scent is strong, so I think some people may find it too strong. I would like to enjoy it while adjusting it to the extent that I don't disturb those around me ‚ô©

I liked the frankincense and myrrh laundry soap scent, so I bought it because I wanted to know about the other scents as well. Contains 8 items: hand soap, room & body mist, 2 types of solid soap, 2 types of body lotion, portable laundry soap, and lipstick. I'm looking forward to using it because it all smells so good!

I've been hesitant to buy scented products because I was afraid of the scent being hit or miss, but this trial size assortment was great because I could try them all easily! There were no duds and many that I would like to buy again when they're gone, so I don't think it's a waste to buy them! Personally, I love the frankincense, myrrh and amber scents so much that I want to smell them for the rest of my life!

review_title: I want a lot of stuff like this to come out.
review_text: I want to try out various Zum products, but what if the scent isn't to my liking? . I was hesitant to buy it, but this was great for just trying it out and getting a feel for it! I hadn't thought about buying lipstick, but it's so moisturizing and I've used many different lipsticks, but this might be the best! I will buy again

It's a mini size, but it comes with a lot of different things, so I bought it because I wanted to try them all. It would also be good for travel. The two soaps are exposed in the pouch, so they have a really nice scent. This time, the sale was what prompted me to buy it, but I personally would have hesitated to buy it at the regular price, so I gave it 4 stars.

The set consists of 8 pieces, the size is suitable.. I think it is suitable for travel use as the package is tightly sealed.. The products have a nice smell.. I have a feeling that they are of high quality because the benefit is great in products with a natural formula.. My skin is dry and sensitive, if there are any new developments, I will update my comment if I have any comments regarding anything in them

review_title: I've been wondering about this for a long time.
review_text: I was always curious about the scent, but I was worried that I wouldn't like it, so I found a trial size 8-piece set! I was worried about the goat milk in the body soap, but it made my skin smooth and I enjoyed my bath time. The lipstick smells like tangerines, so my 4-year-old daughter snatched it (lol) and it seems to be her favorite. I'm looking forward to using the laundry soap too!

It has a strong foreign scent, but it's not an unpleasant smell, it's spicy and the soap is good as an air freshener. I bought 2 soaps, room and body spray (sweet vanilla), hand soap (lavender), disposable laundry soap and 2 body lotions. Everything smelled great and I was very satisfied!

review_title: You can try a little bit at a time
review_text: ZUM's products all have distinctive scents, so it can be daunting to buy the full product (especially the laundry detergent), but this set is very helpful as it allows you to try out a variety of scents and textures. All of the products are small in size and a little pricey, but I recommend it because you can try them out thoroughly.

I really like the Frankincense laundry products, so I bought some to try out. I haven't used them all yet, but the Frankincense soap has a nice scent and is relaxing, lathers well, and leaves your skin feeling fresh after washing. My kids also like it. It also moisturizes my lips, which is nice. I'm glad I was able to try out a few different products.

I've used a few soaps in the past. This one is great because you can try out different things. The size of the soap is just right and it's easy to use. The scent is my favorite frankincense and myrrh, and it smells great just having it on display in the room. I've been cheating on body soap for a while, but these products make me think that natural soap is great again.

review_title: It was small but the content was great
review_text: I bought it because I could try out various products. However, it was smaller than I expected. I should have checked the grams and other things properly. This size of soap is just right. The hand soap is also portable, so it's convenient to carry around. It has a natural scent. If you want to check the feel of the detergent, this is too small, so I don't recommend it. If you want to check the scent, it's possible. It also contains lip balm, so I'm very satisfied.

I bought it as a gift for a friend, but when it arrived I was so impressed with how cute it was that I ended up buying it for myself. It's good because you can try out different things. ZUM products are comfortable to use and don't often disappoint, so that's good. Also, it was good to be able to experience different scents. I'd like to buy it again as a gift.

I bought this because I wanted to be able to try out a variety of Zum products, and the small containers were great for carrying around. The soap is in its original form, so I thought it would look better as a personal item rather than a gift. Some of it is just a sample, so the price seems a little high.

I love ZUM laundry detergent so I bought it. The soap has a great scent and I haven't used it yet, but I keep it in my closet and on the shelf where I keep my linens. It smells great every time I open it. I also keep the room spray at the entrance and spray it. It fills the whole room with a nice scent and makes me feel refreshed. It's great that it's a mini size so I can try out different ones.

It's perfect as a gift. Even people who aren't particularly interested in natural products will be excited by this. The packaging is not very pretty, as it is a style unique to overseas, but I actually like that aspect. The soap is packaged naked, so it will smell for a while if you leave it in your room.

I had been interested in Zumu after reading the reviews! I can't tell the scent of a product until I try it myself, so when I found this product, I bought it immediately. In the end, it wasn't my favorite scent, so I'm really glad I was able to try out a few different scents before purchasing.

It comes in a simple pouch and the scent is leaking out. The soap is just wrapped in a sticker. I don't mind it at all... All the products except the lipstick are trial sizes. I've only used the soap so far, but the scent and wash results make me want to try the other regular size products as well.

review_title: I bought it as a gift but it's too small and looks cheap.
review_text: It smells good and it's good! But it's smaller than I thought. The spray is my favorite Amber body and room spray, and the soap is a small trial size? Two travel sizes are cute and good. The laundry detergent and body cream that can be used once each have "not for sale" written in English because they are testers, and they smell like samples. I want to give them to people who don't know about Zum, but I'm worried that they might seem cheap, so I'm giving it this rating. But it's perfect to use, so I hope they like it. I paid over 2,000 yen for it. PS: The person I gave it to was very grateful. It's the best! 5 stars!!

I liked the Amber mist so much that I decided to buy the larger size. Although the soap is small, it will last for a month even if you wash your body every day. All smell wonderful. The body lotion spreads well and is very comfortable to use, but the scent is strong. The inside of your futon smells nice‚ù£Ô∏è

review_title: I'm happy with the trial size
review_text: I've used detergent and mist, but I'm glad this was my first time trying out soap and lip balm. The soap foams well and the scent is exactly like that detergent scent. liked it. The lip balm has a refreshing citrus scent and is moisturizing but not sticky, which I also really liked.

I love the smell mmmmmm I can‚Äôt! Who loves the smell of subway or laundry soap is gorgeous! And also this smell üòçüòçüòç of lavender and mint üòç use without problems, the quality is great! The whole room smells of lavender and mint, it's so delicious! Mini size, cute packaging, natural benefits and composition. What I like about this product is that there is a choice to try everything at once üòç
I highly recommend it. It has a fragrant smell, is for daily use, is suitable for all ages, is small in size, and has a clean feeling.
The small size is perfect for testing or traveling. The lips were regular size. The soap was directly contained in the product, so the package looked like soap. All the scents are good.

I really like this brand of products, especially the frankincense and myrrh soaps, which have such a strong aroma. It won't dry out sensitive skin after use. Think about buying it as a raffle gift. I don‚Äôt know if it‚Äôs travel size. so disappointed.

A sample of a small size for the hand is good. 3 soaps, two solid and one liquid. There is also a clothes soap, a very small sample, and a very small body that is enough for the hands only, as well as an air freshener in a plastic bag, as is not clear in the picture. Of course, the ingredients, composition, and smell are good and pleasant, and it contains Useful oils, I recommend trying them

I thought it was a little expensive, but I was satisfied because I was able to try various types. In particular, I was curious about the scent of the detergent with the most reviews, so I was glad to be able to try it. Personally, I thought the scent was strong, but after the laundry dried, it calmed down and smelled good. I wasn't very interested in the soap, but when I used the frankincense one to wash my face, it smelled really good, and it didn't make my skin feel tight after washing, and I liked the faint scent that came from the lip balm, which also smelled good. I haven't used the others yet, but I'm looking forward to using them. By the way, the soap was placed directly in a clear pouch, so I was a little worried about the soap residue scattered inside the pouch. The pouch itself was not durable, and it had torn. However, the products themselves are all great, so it's not a problem! (lol)

review_title: The scent of soap fills the room
review_text: The two types of soap have a strong scent. The moment I opened it, a nice scent spread throughout the room. When I put it in a drawer, the scent transferred to my clothes and towels and it really lifted my mood. I'm going to use it as an air freshener for a while, and then when I get tired of it, I'll use it when I take a bath.

I love Zumu. It's a sample size, so it's just right for trying out. I was surprised at how sweet the Amber scent was. I'm glad I was able to try it out in this size. I really like Frankincense and Myrrh. Scents are a matter of preference, so I buy the larger size and stop using it if it's not a scent I like, so I recommend this set! It's simply cute (^o^)

It's been out of stock for a long time, but I was finally able to purchase it! It comes in a small plastic pouch, and the scent wafts through the pouch, making the room smell great‚ô™ I haven't used some of it yet, but I'm looking forward to using it in the future.
Fun kit, I was happy to try the excellent products, great soaps, good creams, great scents. I will definitely buy some of the products after the experience

I love the scent of ZUM so much, so I'm grateful for this set. It sells out so quickly, so I finally got to buy it! I recommend it because you can enjoy a variety of scents. They all smell great and I love them.

This is a popular set and is often out of stock, but I was able to get it at a discount when a coupon code was available! I received every single one, and they all smell different and wonderful! The scents are soothing and hard to find in Japan.

The scent wafted from the cardboard box it arrived in! Iherb has a lot of products with strong scents, so I bought this to see if the smell was to my liking. It's a bit pricey for the size, but I'm glad they have a mini size.

A hand soap with a refreshing scent A sweet body and room spray with a crunchy coconut 2 body oils 2 laundry detergent soaps A milky and minty one I liked the milky one The size is perfect for trying out

review_title: You can try out different scents
review_text: They have a wide variety of scented products all in one place, so you can enjoy using whatever scent suits you best. My favorite is the soap. I also like that they don't use excessive packaging, which is eco-friendly.
It had a nice scent when I opened the box. It's a good deal because it's a small size that you can use up and try out a variety of things. I'm looking forward to using it.

I bought this small set because I wanted to try out different products. The soap, lipstick, body cream, and other products are all great, and I especially like the aroma body spray because it's small and easy to carry around.

I benefited a lot from it and I liked it ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è Buy it, I advise you to buy it. The quality is high. The ingredients are mentioned in the description. I am 25 years old. Its formula is also mentioned in the description. The benefit is high.

The scent is oriental, the feel is refreshing, and the natural ingredients make it safe for children. The trial size is perfect for those who want a variety of products. The solid soap has a gentle scent even when left alone, so it's perfect for decoration.

I enjoyed using ZUM products because they come in small sizes and I was able to try them out. I especially liked the scent of the lip balm and hand soap. I would like to buy the products I like again.

The recipient was very happy with the gift as an opportunity to introduce iHerb to them. Since it was not sealed, the smell spread throughout the room just by leaving it there. Be careful about where you store it!
It smells wonderfully clean, its size is small, it is suitable for travel, and the products of this company are beautiful and nice to use, and then choose what you like from it.
I found such a cute pack in the zum series! I've been curious about the popular Frankincense detergent scent. I'm looking forward to using it!

I started with the laundry detergent and have become a big fan. I bought it to try out because it has a strong scent. The size is small, but I'm very satisfied with the feel. I especially liked the amber scented spray, so I bought the full size.

review_title: Small but has a strong scent
review_text: Even before I opened the box, I noticed a strong citrus scent. It was this. The soap smells so good that I want to keep it as an air freshener. It's a shame to use it lol
Personally, I liked that I could try the soap easily. I'm happy that I can take laundry detergent with me on my trip. It's perfect for trying out the soap.
I'm grateful that I can try it out. I'm happy to be surrounded by such a nice scent. It was smaller than I expected.
